title: Inquiry-Based Learning Workshop on Groundwater Numerical Modeling

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental groundwater flow theory and basic numerical analysis concepts
context.additional_context: Utilizing simple simulation tools based on smart devices due to technological infrastructure constraints

learning_goals: Learners can explain the principles of Voronoi grid design suitable for complex terrain conditions.
Learners can diagnose the geometric requirements of the CVFD method with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can evaluate the validity of numerical modeling results through a three-stage verification process via real-case analysis.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
